text:
Since our mind-blowingly popular first lesson 
featuring Eminem we've received thousands of

messages from you guys asking for another one! 
So today we're bringing you a lesson with his

hit song Rap God! Now this six minute song 
features a bunch of different references to

different comic books to his old songs and 
one of the great things for you to practice

your English is that he raps insanely fast and 
will help you to understand everything. Just a

warning if you are a bit sensitive this has some 
profane language in it especially the F word

so you might want to watch one of our more family 
friendly lessons, but if not let's jump in to the

first part of the
song.

Hey if you're new here every single week we 
make learning English fun just like this!

So that you can understand fast speaking natives, 
without getting lost without missing the jokes

and without subtitles. Just like our fan Sitar who 
says that our lessons are the only way of learning

English he's found that actually works. So we'll 
help you to really improve your english fluency

and comprehension. It's simple join over 3 million 
learners from around the world by hitting that

subscribe button and the bell below and you 
won't miss a single one of our new lessons!

Hey I bet if you're watching this then 
you would like to be able to understand

natives even when we speak really fast or rap 
really fast. Well we will help you to do it

and a really great place to start is with our 
three-part Masterclass. Now in this Masterclass

we'll teach you the three keys to being able to 
understand natives at any speed and those are

vocabulary, pronunciation and cultural context. 
The best part is you can sign up absolutely free

so to learn more and join all you have to do 
is click up here or down description below!

In this video you're going to learn English 
with one of the best and most popular rappers

of all time Eminem! We're covering portions 
of three of his hit songs in this lesson.

Lose yourself, the real Slim Shady 
and the Monster featuring Rihanna.
